cluster_relations.rel_desc: The escaped criminal has a hook instead of a hand.
The collective imagination is a component or attribute of society.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Psychological and Cultural Constructs of Urban Legends

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject entity includes the object entity as a physical or conceptual component.
args.justification: The escaped criminal is described as physically possessing a hook in place of a hand, a clear part-whole relation where the subject includes the object as a component.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject entity is a component, aspect, or subset of the object entity.
args.justification: The collective imagination is described as a component or attribute of society, a conceptual part-whole relation where the subject is a constituent of the broader object.

Both relations describe mereological structure: one where the subject has a component (has_part) and one where the subject is a component of a larger whole (is_part_of). Grouping them under a shared part-whole relation class is appropriate despite opposite directionality.
Both links describe how entities are composed from, or include, other entities (physical body part vs. conceptual aspect of society), which fits the broad COMPOSITION dimension.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject entity includes the object entity as a physical or conceptual component.
executed_decisions.justification: The escaped criminal is described as physically possessing a hook in place of a hand, a clear part-whole relation where the subject includes the object as a component.

executed_decisions.justification: The collective imagination is described as a component or attribute of society, a conceptual part-whole relation where the subject is a constituent of the broader object.

Both relations describe mereological structure: one where the subject has a component (has_part) and one where the subject is a component of a larger whole (is_part_of). Grouping them under a shared part-whole relation class is appropriate despite opposite directionality.
Both links describe how entities are composed from, or include, other entities (physical body part vs. conceptual aspect of society), which fits the broad COMPOSITION dimension.
